CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Photovoltaic effects of PCDSeBT were investigated in BHJ PSCs with the device structures of the standard configuration glass / ITO / PEDOT : PSS / PCDSeBT : PC71BM / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| PCDSeBT      |
| PEDOT : PSS  |
| PC71BM       |
| Glass        |
| ITO          |
| Al           |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| PCDSeBT      |
| PEDOT : PSS  |
| PC71BM       |
| Glass        |
| ITO          |
| Al (metal)   |

Explanation:
- "Photovoltaic effects" is a phenomenon, not a material.
- "BHJ PSCs" is a type of device, not a material.
- "device structures" and "standard configuration" are descriptions, not materials.
- "glass / ITO / PEDOT : PSS" is a list of layers in the device structure, not materials, but "ITO" can be considered a material in this context as it is an inorganic thin film commonly used as a transparent conductive electrode.
- "Al" can be considered a material in this context as it is mentioned as the back contact material.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Photovoltaic effects of PCDSeBT were investigated in BHJ PSCs with the device structures of the standard configuration glass / ITO / PEDOT : PSS / PCDSeBT : PC71BM / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Photovoltaic effects |
| PCDSeBT |
| BHJ PSCs |
| Device structures |
| Standard configuration |
| Glass |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PCDSeBT : PC71BM |
| PC71BM |
| Al |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| Photovoltaic effects |
| PCDSeBT |
| BHJ PSCs (device structures) |
| Glass |
| ITO |
| PEDOT : PSS |
| PC71BM |
| Al (electrode) |

Note: "BHJ PSCs" is included as a property since it refers to the specific type of device being investigated.
